title: Sound On: The 2022 Biden Agenda
itunes:title: Sound On: The 2022 Biden Agenda
description:
Guests: Bill Hoagland, Senior Vice President at the Bipartisan Policy Center on President Biden's domestic agenda and Bill Fairies, Bloomberg National Security team leader discusses foreign policy issues that defined 2021 and look ahead to 2022.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
